tweets.text: @GavinTabinerEA @johncurtinEA @TobyWillisonEA @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @AdamBaylissEA @JamesBevanEA More disposable plastics

We‚Äôre working hard to keep our fleet of operational vehicles safe for our drivers so we are ready to respond to incidents of #flooding and environmental #pollution around the clock. #plan #prepare #respond #cat1responders #TeamEA https://t.co/fFwGjB6aiX

#Northamptonshire woman convicted after van used to dump waste in north London...

She's fined AND gets hefty costs...

‚¨áÔ∏èThe vehicle and the wood she discarded...‚¨áÔ∏è

Please report waste crime to us on 0800 807060; or @CrimestoppersUK on 0800 555111

#READ the whole story ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/17WnRu6Kdx
@EnvAgencyAnglia Can‚Äôt even read the sign in your photograph as it‚Äôs out of focus!

The historic concrete culvert in a tributary of the Torridge represented a barrier to fish movement. The old quarry track was no longer used and the landowner agreed to the culverts removal, opening up >2km of watercourse upstream to fish @EnvAgency #WEG #TRRP https://t.co/8096LIr5kJ

Day 50

The next environmental ticking time bomb will be toxic and dangerous #PFAS and #PFOS chemicals in UK waters.

Hoping for voices to amplify and investigate. 

 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News @jonsnowC4 @EnvAgencyYNE

New addition to the #TeamEA fleet at Selby Depot is this McConnel Robocut RC56. This remote controlled mower allows teams to maintain our sloped flood defences safely. It can operate on slopes of 55 ¬∞ whilst its operator stays safely on level ground. #flooddefencemaintenance https://t.co/ynxNiVxnad

urls.title: Report incident locations efficiently | what3words
urls.description: Use our free toolkit with posters, images and videos to get started. If you‚Äôre using what3words for incident reporting, we‚Äôd love to hear about

tweets.text:
Incident locations can be hard to describe.üìç‚ÅâÔ∏è

So organisations like the @EnvAgency, the @NationalGridUK and many #councils accept what3words and use it to send resources to the right place faster.

üëâRead more about what3words and #incident reporting: https://t.co/TthYFnKfs6 https://t.co/NpL0x2My06
We've been in Dorchester‚Äôs Mill Street today, testing a temporary flood defence that would reduce the risk of flooding from the River Frome #winterready https://t.co/ragNAZGZTO

@mrtunners @EnvAgencyYNE @AdamBaylissEA @johncurtinEA @EnvAgency @TobyWillisonEA Several battery powered variants on or about to come to market @mrtunners üëçüèº In fact we are due to trial one in the coming weeks alongside a fully electric excavator and solar generator ‚òÄÔ∏è

There's still time to register! Today at 5pm BST we're discussing the future of the countryside with @van_griffiths @EnvAgency, @Minette_Batters @NFUtweets, Mark Bridgeman @CLAtweets, Beccy Speight @Natures_Voice and @CrispinTruman @CPRE. Register: https://t.co/Gr180uODZs

Just doing my reading ahead of @LivingWithH2O board meeting tomorrow - so much great work going on across the partnership tackling #flood #resilience into the future. @YorkshireWater @Hullfloodrisk @ERfloodrisk @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @floodinnovation @EEIatHull @learnbyhand https://t.co/wrMMBgC46c

@GavinTabinerEA @EnvAgencyYNE @AdamBaylissEA @johncurtinEA @EnvAgency @TobyWillisonEA Do they make an electric version?

So let me get this right, Southern Water
-Is due to be sentenced for pollution (2010-15)
-Deliberately manipulated water samples (2010-17) 
-Makes lots of people redundant (2020)
-Awards boss (joined 2017) ¬£538k bonus (2020)
- Is still polluting, see Chichester Harbour (2020)
Huh

Meanwhile in Herefordshire we await the actions of the Nutrient Management Board. So far it has failed to stop the destruction of the River Wye SAC SSSI.
It meets tomorrow but where and when is a mystery. We have the agenda but no board papers. @EnvAgency @WGEnviroAgri https://t.co/KAMp80UBrt

Great presentations today at @UKELA_LAW 's seminar on Waste Law after Brexit. Thank you to @jacob_hayler from @ESA_tweets, @AngusEvers, Duncan Mitchell from @EnvAgency and Chala McKenna from @dcslegaluk. Couldn't fit all of us on one photo so here's Chala's! https://t.co/y0T23rqtwT

Today is #WorldRiversDay. In Yorkshire & the North East we're blessed with many beautiful rivers and streams. In Yorks we've got a number projects helping to restore rivers: DNAire, Ryevitalise, Salmon to South Yorks, Doing More For The Derwent. https://t.co/yEj4KQUo78

tweets.text: Another project completed in the Isbourne catchment....this one consists of leaky Woody dams, attenuation areas and the use of an old mill pond. #nfm #slowtheflow #isbournecatch #flooding #naturalfloodmanagement @worcscc  @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK https://t.co/D9HTSkyOQg

@RussellB1ggs I've been scoping some projects on small rivers outside of Norfolk this week and OMG so many are grim & devoid of life, sluggish brown channels with monotonous banks. Contrast that with the Scottish work I'm doing and meandering untouched waterways left right and centre!

Are you hiring tradespeople or builders? #TuesdayThoughts

Always ask them to include waste disposal in their quote and check they have a waste carriers licence at https://t.co/x2KVjLDFPt 

#SCRAPflytipping #dutyofcare 
@EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/eUqaXI44It
@davidpatrick @EnvAgencySW Ultimately it will give you real time river flow rates rather than just level- important for all the studies I mentioned

tweets.text:
Rivers are vital to our environment. We respond to an environmental incident every 45 minutes to stop and reverse damage to our rivers. 
 
Let's work together to protect them. 
 
#WorldRiversDay https://t.co/0d3EzXd2ic

Beccy Speight of @Natures_Voice: People are realising that the countryside provides us with food, a living & an environment in which we can all thrive. We need to think about both carbon & biodiversity, we're dependent on these for our own survival.
@AJonesTheSteam @EdenRiversTrust @EnvAgencyNW @networkrail @AquaUoS Brilliant! That's so good to hear  I hope you are telling the passengers what's going on.
